title: Mark Zuckerberg teases wearable tech with neural interface in Facebook post - Reuters
content: Mark Zuckerberg teases wearable tech with neural interface in Facebook post  Reuters
description: Meta Platforms Inc's chief executive, Mark Zuckerberg, on Wednesday teased a new smart glasses project with EssilorLuxottica , posting a photo of the eyewear company's chairman sporting a prototype of a neural interface wristband - designed for directing other devices.
